messages.name: Joanna
messages.message: Welcome to the wonderful world of  Chatty.

messages.name: Xavier
messages.message: Chatty is an interactive 'chatting' website application that will allow you to communicate with friends quickly!

messages.name: Sven
messages.message: You can always learn more about Chatty by visiting our website that will keep you up to date on any new changes.

messages.name: Gunter
messages.message: Go ahead and follow Chatty on Twitter as well @Chatty.
